cancelLobby(uint256).details: Solo el creador puede cancelar antes de que empiece

params.entryFee: Costo de entrada en wei o tokens
params.token: Direccin del token ERC20 (address(0) para ETH nativo)

emergencyWithdraw(address,uint256).details: Solo puede ser llamada por el owner en casos excepcionales

endLobby(uint256,address[]).details: CUALQUIER JUGADOR del lobby puede llamar esta funcin (para auto-distribucin)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._newDevWallet: Nueva direccin de la wallet dev

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

cancelLobby(uint256).notice: Cancela un lobby y reembolsa a los jugadores

emergencyEndLobby(uint256,address[]).notice: Fuerza el fin de un lobby atascado (solo emergencias)

emergencyWithdraw(address,uint256).notice: Funcin de emergencia para recuperar fondos atrapados

endLobby(uint256,address[]).notice: Finaliza un lobby y distribuye premios

getLobbyInfo(uint256).notice: Obtiene informacin completa de un lobby

getLobbyPlayers(uint256).notice: Obtiene los jugadores de un lobby

isPlayerInLobby(uint256,address).notice: Verifica si una direccin est en un lobby

setDevWallet(address).notice: Actualiza la wallet que recibe los fees
